Text.val: 08.05.2008 SH SCR13513 Added tests on DEBH_REFERENCELIMIT <> null to determine
... set to default value 'N' in case of incorrect parameter

STP.TXT: PI.INFS_CODE is empty, no DHIC rows are selected

SQL_STMT_U.val: select DHIC_ID, min(DHIC_INFS_CODE), min(DHIC_DEBH) from :1/DHIC where DHIC_INFS_CODE = ':2' and DHIC_ID <> '' group by DHIC_ID order by DHIC_ID for fetch only

Text.val: -- Distinct selection of DHIC_ID, lowest DHIC_DEBH is selected
-- Determine which debtor should stay (only for first two selected debtors from
-- In case of both debtors have no limits, the debtor with the lowest DEBH_NO
-- All further selected debtors in this task have to be merged to the detor

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast (sum(DEBC_CREDITLIMITH) as decimal (11,0)) , cast (sum(DEBC_FINANCELIMITH) as decimal (11,0)) from :1/DEBC where DEBC_DEBH = :2
